function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of awareness and transparency about data sharing and privacy risks in e-health technology","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate monitoring and compliance of self-isolation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy protection issues related to the collection and transfer of sensitive health data via wearable devices and cloud networks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scalability and resource demand challenges for 5g-enabled healthcare applications, including contact tracing and monitoring.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pure gps-based contact tracing solutions lack the accuracy to identify close contacts within a few meters.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delivery of items via beyond line-of-sight blos uav may lead to technological failures or errors, increasing the risk of delayed or inaccurate deliveries.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mobile device-based self-isolation monitoring may be susceptible to data breaches, compromising the privacy and security of the individuals’ location and health information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uav-based monitoring of covid-19 patients may raise concerns regarding personal privacy and consent for data collection and surveillance.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of raw materials and labor force disrupts regular production","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalance in the supply chain for healthcare products such as ppe, ventilators, and drugs could lead to shortages, increasing the risk of healthcare workers and patients being exposed to contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of covid-19 patient data from different healthcare centers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Making covid-19 patient data available to the public","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Live video conferencing for healthcare professionals and patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ultra-dense small cell networks may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases in indoor environments.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High data rates for a large number of served users may lead to overcrowding in indoor environments, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resources in healthcare facilities due to existing covid-19 patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to minimize the risk of healthcare professionals getting exposed to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to increased use of remote healthcare services telehealth .","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in managing the implementation of 5g technologies for healthcare use cases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The reliance on technological advancements may lead to the neglect of basic public health measures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid adoption of new technologies without proper testing and validation may result in unforeseen consequences","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 due to sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Travel restrictions and control","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of virtual reality technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Noisy precision / recall curve may make it difficult to estimate model performance for object detection.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial losses in construction companies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial strain on self-employed individuals due to lockdowns","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in immigrant workers impacting construction projects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in perception of pandemic impact between developed and developing countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adverse effects of covid-19 on the global economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks and adverse effects of covid-19 on tunnel construction sites","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on construction professionals’ performance","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction professionals interacting with covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multiple rounds of surveys conducted with construction professionals","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflexivity in urban soundscapes research","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tightly controlled production environment may lead to a false sense of security and neglect of potential risks.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sampling strategy targeting a particular group may limit the representation of diverse experiences and perspectives.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"International collaboration involving 25 academics creates potential for transmission of contagious diseases across borders.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Podcasting project involves close contact between academics, increasing the risk of transmitting contagious diseases within the academic community.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Attentiveness to non-human others and the more-than-human city","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Familiarity with lockdown measures leading to complacency","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global circulation of covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in suburban streets due to increased pedestrian, jogger, and cyclist activity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowdfunding and volunteer delivery services increasing physical interaction and potential exposure to the virus","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and consideration for front-line workers in essential businesses","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent references to the visceral experience of being in the city under covid-19.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"People hoarding essential supplies such as toilet paper","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to gather in public spaces leading to new ways of social interaction","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of representation of
